overview: The assassination of Tianjizi, a taoist teacher traveling to Beijing reveals a huge conspiracy to usurp the Tang emperor and seize power by the two major forces of the current state minister and the Jianghu organization "Sky Net Sect". How will heroes such as Jin Shengnan and Luo Chonglou turn the tide and punish the evil?
title: The Hero of Tang Dynasty: Autumn Water in the Desert
